parameters.name: PFace1
parameters.description: Pointer to the first IFace2 object

parameters.name: PFace2
parameters.description: Pointer to the second IFace2 object

title: IGussetFeatureData.GetSupportingFaces
description: Gets the two, adjacent, supporting faces for this gusset feature.
signature:
System.Boolean GetSupportingFaces( 
   out Face2
PFace1
,
   out Face2
PFace2
)

parameters.name: PFace1
parameters.description: Pointer to the first IFace2 object

parameters.name: PFace2
parameters.description: Pointer to the second IFace2 object

returns: True if both faces are returned, false if not
